description:
When mountain adventure meets windstorms and whiteouts, you’ll be glad of the Nebula Pro Jacket. With zoned construction and recycled PrimaLoft® insulation it’s a seriously warm layer for winter mountaineering.

The midi-baffled Nebula Pro jacket is the warmest of our recycled PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Luxe™ jackets. Mimicking the performance of down, this 100% recycled insulation offers exceptional warmth for low weight. We've strategically placed sheets of recycled PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation across the shoulders and on the cuffs and hood for additional durability.

Built from recycled 30D Pertex® Quantum Pro ripstop nylon with a water-repellant DWR coating the Nebula Pro is robust and weather resistant. It features an adjustable helmet-compatible hood with stiffened peak and a two-way YKK® VISLON® ® front zip with insulated storm guard. Warm, fast drying and robust it's perfect for trekking and mountaineering in harsh winter weather.
name: Rab Nebula Pro Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% recycled polyamide with polyurethane coating and 100% recycled polyamide lining

specs.key: Body mapped insulation to optimize warmth around core and durability in high wear areas. Main body
